name: Psylocke

abilities.name: Psi-Katana
abilities.details: Attacks with her telekinetically-focused katana in a three-hit combo.

abilities.name: Psychic Knife
abilities.details: Throws her focused telepathic knife, briefly silencing enemy abilities on hit.

abilities.name: Telekinetic Dash
abilities.details: Performs a quick dash, phasing briefly.

abilities.name: Psi-Bow
abilities.details: Charges and fires a powerful psychic arrow.

ultimate.name: Telekinetic Katana Barrage
ultimate.effect: Unleashes a flurry of rapid psi-katana strikes in a cone in front of her.
ultimate.details: Channels the ultimate for several seconds, dealing high damage.

passives.name: Ninjutsu
passives.details: Moves slightly faster while crouched and makes less noise.

lore: Betsy Braddock, a powerful mutant telepath and telekinetic, originally British but whose mind was swapped into the body of the Japanese ninja Kwannon. She often focuses her psychic power into weapons like her iconic psi-katana.
